comment: Huge new study. Vast majority of Americans (80%) say "political correctness is a problem". Hispanics (87%) Asians (82%) Whites (79%) African-Americans (75%) Young people (79%) 'Progressive' elites are totally out of touch.
amr:

                  :ARG2-of (ii / include-91

                              :mod (c2 / country
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "America")))
                        :ARG3 (p3 / percentage-entity
                              :value 80)))
            :ARG1 (p4 / problem
                  :domain (c3 / correct-02
                        :ARG1 (p5 / politics))))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (e / ethnic-group
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Hispanic"))
            :op2 (e2 / ethnic-group
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "Asia"))
            :op3 (e3 / ethnic-group
                  :name (n6 / name
                        :op1 "White"))
            :op4 (p6 / person
                  :mod (c4 / continent
                        :name (n7 / name
                              :op1 "Africa")))
            :op5 (p7 / person
                  :mod (y / young))
            :op6 (p8 / person
                  :mod (p9 / percentage-entity
                        :value 75))
            :op7 (p10 / person
                  :mod y)
            :ARG2-of (ii2 / include-91
                  :ARG1 (p11 / person
                        :mod (p12 / percentage-entity
                              :value 79))))
      :ARG1-of (ii3 / in-touch-11
            :polarity -
            :ARG2 (e4 / elite
                  :ARG1-of (p13 / progressive-02))
            :degree (t / total)))
